app.title: Thaumic Cast
messages.signInHint: Go to Settings to sign in for cloud features
messages.signInForCloud: Sign in to use cloud features like Sonos account linking and remote access.
messages.noSpeakers: No Sonos speakers found on network
messages.retryHint: Make sure the server is on the same network as your speakers
messages.desktopDetected: Desktop app detected! Switch to local mode for quick setup.
hints.serverUrl: The URL of your Thaumic Cast server. For Local Mode, use the server's LAN IP (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:3000). You must also log in via this URL.
hints.cloud: Uses Sonos Cloud API. Requires OAuth login and a public server URL (via tunnel or domain).
hints.local: Uses UPnP/SOAP on local network. No public URL needed, but server and speakers must be on the same network.
hints.speakerIp: Enter the IP address of any Sonos speaker on your network. This bypasses auto-discovery (useful for WSL2 or VPN setups). Find it in the Sonos app under Settings â†’ About My System.
hints.language: Choose your preferred language (currently English only).
hints.discovery: Scans the local network using SSDP. May not work in WSL2 or VPN setups.
errors.fixBeforeSaving: Please fix the errors above before saving.
errors.invalidUrlExample: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:3000)
errors.invalidIp: Please enter a valid IP address
errors.invalidIpExample: Please enter a valid IP address (e.g., 192.168.1.50)
